add.empty: You need to provide a URL or a list of URLs
add.not-added: {{{url}}} could not be added to the track list

remove.empty: You need to provide a URL or a list of URLs
remove.not-found: {{{url}}} not found in the tracking list
remove.not-removed: {{{url}}} not removed from the tracking list

command.start: :wave: Hi {{name}}! I'm your personal monitor bot. My mission is to track a list of websites and notify status changes.

error.database: You have to set the environment variable DATABASE_URL with the URL of a PostgreSQL database
error.leave: I'm sorry. I am a private bot. I am not authorized to chat with you.
error.target: You have to set the environment variable TELEGRAM_TO with the ID of the target chat
error.token: You have to set the environment variable TELEGRAM_TOKEN with the value from @BotFather

url.empty: You need to provide an URL or a list of URLs

status.error: {{{url}}} is responding, but the status code is {{statusCode}} :worried:
